lead_paragraph: The major indexes in the United States were all down more than 3 percent but then staged a turnaround in the final hour.

byline.original: By PETER EAVIS and NEIL GOUGH

snippet: The major indexes in the United States were all down more than 3 percent but then staged a turnaround in the final hour.

headline.main: ‘Noon Swoon,’ Then Recovery That May Signal Market Turnaround
headline.print_headline: ‘Noon Swoon,’ Then Recovery That May Signal Market Turnaround

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas

abstract: Dow Jones industrial average plummets more than 500 points, before recovering later in day for loss of 249 points, or 1.56 percent, to 15,766.74; Standard & Poor's 500-stock index falls 22 points, or 1.17 percent; turnaround could signal bottom on markets.
